com.aston.group.stationdefender.callbacks

Interface PlayerCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameScreen

    public interface PlayerCallback
    PlayerCallback is the callback class for Player

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHealth(int health)
      The callback to add health to the Tower
      void onPause()
      The callback to pause the game
      boolean placeUnit(Unit unit, int x, int y)
      The callback to place an Actor on the Level

    • Method Detail

      • placeUnit

        boolean placeUnit(Unit unit,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        The callback to place an Actor on the Level
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to place on the Level
        x - The X co-ordinate to place the Unit
        y - The Y co-ordinate to place the Unit
        Returns:
        true if the placement is successful, false if not

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        The callback to pause the game

      • addHealth

        void addHealth(int health)
        The callback to add health to the Tower
        Parameters:
        health - The amount of health to be added to the Tower
